attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should we pay a ridiculous amount of money just because of ONE channel and their refusal to put advertisement space on their network. we are forced to pay this even if we dont watch the channel. think for one moment how ridiculous it is to even NEED a tv license in the first place. you dont need a license to have an Ipod , you dont need one to own a pet, etc etc , why have one for a BOX thats sits in the corner of your room.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
